examples.text: Ay'a ilk ayak basan insan Neil Armstrong'tur.
examples.translation: The first person to set foot on the Moon was Neil Armstrong.
There are 12 months in a year.

glosses: exclamation of surprise, shock or fear: oh!
a unisex given name from Turkish
Moon (sole natural satellite of the Earth)
